Public Remarks: Last night I dreamt of the perfect condo, it was located in Lower Lonsdale and only steps away from the water. The warm ocean air filled my lungs while I sipped a morning coffee from my oversized balcony and watched the sea planes leave the harbour. The dream continued... I prepared for work that day at my home office while the world outside jogged along the Spirit Trail or playing tourist, while enjoying a beautiful view of downtown Vancouver.  Grateful to be here, I sat down at my computer but my thoughts were not about work.. I was planning dinner for the friends that were coming over that evening, because I love to entertain! The only troubling part of my dream was that I couldn't figure out if I should serve seafood, meat or a vegetarian meal. What would you do?
Realtor Remarks: Measurements taken from Strata Plan. Please have your clients view Virtual Tour Link prior to booking a showing. Parking #219 (Plus 1 VIP Parking Pass), Storage #166. All showings require masks to be worn & Covid waiver to be provided (See Docs) Team Disclosure to be signed with offers (See docs).
